overview: To quote Edina Monsoon: "Armpit licking, sweetie! Armpits!" and Factory Video continue to give their customers what they want. I imagine their request-line is run by a pervy little Kenneth Starr type, dredging out every last sordid detail: "Um, yes, more sweat," "Close-ups of cooze ooze, please" or "Howâ€™s about a Bette Midler scenario?"
title: Rank
